metadata.title: CVE-2021-45078 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - negligible.
metadata.description: stab_xcoff_builtin_type in stabs.c in GNU Binutils through 2.37 allows attackers to cause a denial of service (heap-based buffer overflow) or possibly have unspecified other impact, as demonstrated by an out-of-bounds write. NOTE: this issue exists because of an incorrect fix for CVE-2018-12699.

notes.note: seth-arnold> binutils isn't safe for untrusted inputs.

criterions.comment: binutils package in impish is affected and needs fixing.
